First line is the project "title" as on GitHub.
The second line is the minimal copyright statement. We might want to have the AUTHORS file link to GitHub contributors page in README. E.g. https://github.com/ethereum/evmc/blob/master/AUTHORS.md
I prefer to change the file header to this one instead of only changing cpp-ethereum to Aleth. But I do not propose to change everything at once.
